examples: My wife talked sense into me.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
The two men talked.
A true leader walks the talk.
He talked a blue streak all through breakfast.
words.defineEn: to tell someone about the information, feelings, or ideas that we have
words.defineVi: để nói với ai đó về thông tin, cảm xúc hoặc ý tưởng mà chúng tôi có

examples: Morning brought no relief from the heat.
The morning is a time of new beginnings and possibilities.
My mother waters the plants in our garden every morning.
I had a letter from my brother this morning.
I got a call from Dave this morning.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between when the sun starts to rise and the middle of the day at twelve o'clock
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày là giữa khi mặt trời bắt đầu mọc và giữa ngày lúc mười hai giờ

examples: I really love summer evenings.
The college also runs evening classes in bricklaying and joinery.
Throughout the evening, the waiter handled the busy restaurant.
The party is on Friday evening.
Programs are running a few minutes behind schedule this evening.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between the time that the sun starts to set and when the sky becomes completely dark
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày nằm giữa thời điểm mặt trời bắt đầu lặn và khi bầu trời trở nên tối hoàn toàn

examples: Activities range from trapeze and freefall to archery and motorsports.
What's your favorite evening activity?
The whole house was a hive of activity on the day before the wedding.
There's a lot of police activity around here lately.
Italy's Mediterranean climate and diverse geography offer a wide range of outdoor activities
words.defineEn: something that a person spends time doing, particularly to accomplish a certain purpose
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó mà một người dành thời gian làm, đặc biệt là để hoàn thành một mục đích nhất định

examples: That man eats Ramen noodles daily for dinner but for his dog, he threw a big party.
The plants want watering daily.
The mother of two young children felt overwhelmed by her daily tasks, which included cooking, cleaning, and child-rearing.
And you still can't get a good daily woman now to clean, not for love or money.
Support your thyroid health by incorporating bladderwrack supplements into your daily routine.
words.defineEn: in a way that happens every day or once a day
words.defineVi: trong một cách mà xảy ra mỗi ngày hoặc một lần một ngày

examples: The policeman hammered home the dangers of drinking and driving.
My son is coming home soon.
The forest is home to a diverse range of plant and animal species.
I pressed the issue home to them.
To hit a home run.
words.defineEn: the place that we live in, usually with our family
words.defineVi: nơi mà chúng tôi sống, thường là với gia đình của chúng tôi

examples: It really gets up my nose.
He's just getting up my nose so much at the moment.
He got up on the wrong side of the bed this morning.
You, the night owl, are getting up at 5 AM tomorrow?
I got up and looked out of the window.
words.defineEn: to get on our feet and stand up
words.defineVi: để có được trên đôi chân của chúng tôi và đứng lên

words.defineEn: to put on one's clothes
words.defineVi: để mặc quần áo của một người

examples: I had a brush with him a number of years ago.
The chef brushed a sweet glaze made of honey and soy sauce onto the grilled salmon.
We need a new brush for our pet's fur.
She had a brush with stardom in the eighties as a member of a minor pop band.
The hairstylist used a round brush to create curls.
words.defineEn: to use a toothbrush to clean and remove plaque or food particles from the teeth and gums
words.defineVi: sử dụng bàn chải đánh răng để làm sạch và loại bỏ mảng bám hoặc các hạt thức ăn khỏi răng và nướu

examples: That DJ's voice really sets my teeth on edge.
He sank his teeth into an apple.
He gritted his teeth in anger.
Their teeth are sharp enough to break the skin.
Their teeth are sharp enough to break the skin.
words.defineEn: one of the things in our mouth that are hard and white and we use to chew and bite food with
words.defineVi: một trong những thứ cứng và trắng trong miệng của chúng ta và chúng ta dùng để nhai và cắn thức ăn bằng

examples: He carefully combed his hair before going out.
The police went over the house with a fine-tooth comb.
She used a small brush to comb her eyebrows into shape.
I looked everywhere with a fine-toothed comb but can't find my purse.
I usually stand in front of the mirror to comb my hair.
words.defineEn: a flat piece of plastic, metal, etc. with a row of thin teeth, used for untangling or arranging the hair
words.defineVi: một miếng nhựa phẳng, kim loại, v.v. với một hàng răng mỏng, dùng để gỡ rối hoặc sắp xếp tóc

examples: I had a brush with him a number of years ago.
The chef brushed a sweet glaze made of honey and soy sauce onto the grilled salmon.
We need a new brush for our pet's fur.
She had a brush with stardom in the eighties as a member of a minor pop band.
The hairstylist used a round brush to create curls.
words.defineEn: to arrange or tidy up one's hair with a brush
words.defineVi: để sắp xếp hoặc dọn dẹp tóc của một người với một bàn chải

examples: he shaved his beard off.
Enhance the flavor of your dishes by shaving truffle over scrambled eggs for a luxurious breakfast.
I will play Juliet, as soon as I shave my beard.
When Andy started losing his hair, he decided to shave it all off.
Don't criticize the new intern so harshly, remember the saying - a barber learns to shave by shaving fools.
words.defineEn: to remove hair, particularly facial hair, with a razor
words.defineVi: để tẩy lông, đặc biệt là lông mặt, bằng dao cạo

examples: I put on a clean pair of socks every morning.
He's just putting on an act for the boss's benefit.
He put on his leather jacket before heading out on his motorcycle.
He was always putting on airs and graces.
She put on her swimsuit and jumped into the pool.
words.defineEn: to put a piece of clothing on one's or someone else's body
words.defineVi: để đặt một mảnh quần áo trên cơ thể của một người hoặc người khác

examples: She wasn’t wearing any makeup.
She looks a million dollars in her elegant evening gown and flawless makeup.
She looks like something the cat dragged in after a long night of partying, with smudged makeup and tired eyes.
The school had a policy of not allowing makeup exams, but when a student missed an exam due to a medical emergency, the administration realized that circumstances alter cases.
Emily woke up late and rushed to get ready for work, resulting in mismatched clothes, messy hair, and smudged makeup.
words.defineEn: any type of substance that one uses to add more color or definition to one's face in order to alter or enhance one's appearance
words.defineVi: bất kỳ loại chất nào mà một người sử dụng để tô thêm màu sắc hoặc đường nét cho khuôn mặt của một người nhằm thay đổi hoặc cải thiện diện mạo của một người

examples: The factory employee was eating lunc in the cafeteria.
so I ate my fill.
I eat pizza on Wednesdays.
I ate a delicious apple for a healthy snack.
I ate a handful of sweet grapes for a refreshing snack.
words.defineEn: to put food into the mouth, then chew and swallow it
words.defineVi: để đưa thức ăn vào miệng, sau đó nhai và nuốt nó

examples: My parents always drink orange juice for breakfast.
The new secretary made a dog's breakfast out of the filing system.
They serve breakfast at all hours.
Breakfast is served until 9 am.
Your breakfast is coming soon.
words.defineEn: the first meal someone has in the early hours of the day
words.defineVi: bữa ăn đầu tiên của ai đó vào đầu giờ trong ngày

examples: His family comes first.
Knowledge of cooking comes easy to him.
Come rain or shine.
After dinner comes the reckoning.
All good things come to an end.
words.defineEn: to move or travel toward something or someone
words.defineVi: để di chuyển hoặc đi về phía một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
A couple of years in the army should make a man of him.
Good wine can make a meal.
The news really made my day.
words.defineEn: to prepare or cook something
words.defineVi: để chuẩn bị hoặc nấu một cái gì đó

examples: The price includes dinner, bed, and breakfast.
After dinner comes the reckoning.
The bell sounded for dinner.
The government's latest proposals are a dog's dinner.
Dinner is served between 7 and 10 p.m.
words.defineEn: the main meal of the day, eaten either in the middle of the day or in the evening
words.defineVi: bữa ăn chính trong ngày, ăn vào giữa ngày hoặc vào buổi tối

examples: My friend studied the nutritional benefits of different legumes for her research project.
We study the history of our country in social studies class.
She studied different subjects in school, from math to history.
We study different subjects like math, science, and English at school.
Researchers study diatoms to better understand the environmental conditions of aquatic habitats.
words.defineEn: to spend time to learn about certain subjects by reading books, going to school, etc.
words.defineVi: dành thời gian để tìm hiểu về các chủ đề nhất định bằng cách đọc sách, đi học, v.v.

examples: Watch your mouth!
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Watch your head on the low ceiling.
Watch me!
words.defineEn: to look at a thing or person and pay attention to it for some time
words.defineVi: để nhìn vào một điều hoặc người và chú ý đến nó trong một thời gian

examples: Cable TV reaches a huge audience.
The TV quiz was more fun than a barrel of monkeys!
The TV stays on all day in their house.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
She regularly appears on TV.
words.defineEn: an electronic device that shows images and videos and plays sounds and people use to watch different programs
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử hiển thị hình ảnh và video và phát âm thanh và mọi người sử dụng để xem các chương trình khác nhau

words.defineEn: to remove one's clothes from one's body
words.defineVi: để loại bỏ quần áo của một người từ cơ thể của một người

words.defineEn: to wash and clean ourselves with water while being under the shower
words.defineVi: rửa và làm sạch bản thân bằng nước khi đang dưới vòi hoa sen

examples: I'll run you a bath.
To take a bath/shower/wash.
We should fill the bathtub with warm water for a relaxing bath.
My sister used to take a relaxing bath or shower before going to bed at night.
She wrapped herself in a warm bath towel after the shower.
words.defineEn: the action of washing our body in a bathtub by putting it into water
words.defineVi: hành động rửa cơ thể của chúng ta trong bồn tắm bằng cách đặt nó vào nước

words.defineEn: go to sleep; to lie down in one's bed to sleep; prepare to sleep
words.defineVi: đi ngủ; nằm xuống giường để ngủ; chuẩn bị ngủ
